tip: Always carry a photocopy of your passport in a separate bag from the original.
Learn a few basic phrases in the local language—it goes a long way!
Roll your clothes when packing to save space and reduce wrinkles.
Keep digital and physical copies of all important travel documents.
Notify your bank before international travel to avoid card holds.
Carry a small power bank for emergencies—especially on long outings.
Check visa requirements well in advance of your trip.
Download offline maps of the cities you'll visit, just in case.
